data.meaning_mnemonic: The <radical>mouth</radical> of the <radical>king</radical> extends all the way around him (like in this kanji). Where his mouth reaches, that is his <kanji>country</kanji>, give or take a few <radical>drop</radical>s.
data.meaning_hint: Imagine his talking taking physical form. As he talks, waves extend out from him, and stop right at the border of his country before getting to the next one.
data.reading_mnemonic: Turns out the king of this <kanji>country</kanji> loves drinking <reading>Coke</reading> (こく). Every morning that big mouth of his swallows a whole 2-liter bottle of Coke for breakfast.
data.reading_hint: Would you drink that much soda for breakfast? Now this king says he wants to pass a law requiring everyone in the country to drink nothing but Coke! That's crazy!
